alert.note: Alert for Lake; Mason; Muskegon; Newaygo; Oceana (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:50AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Newaygo, Lake, Mason, northwestern Muskegon and Oceana Counties through 445 AM EDT... At 350 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Manistee to 20 miles southwest of Silver Lake SP. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ludington... Hart... Baldwin... Ludington SP... Shelby... Fremont... Whitehall... Montague... Scottville... Hesperia... Pentwater... Fountain... Free Soil... Hamlin Lake... Mears SP... Silver Lake SP... Holton... Weare... Elbridge... Colfax... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
